Text:
function EP03_15()

    --.承-5【8月第2週】「龍宮院家の秘密」
    SaveData.Title = "龍宮院家の秘密"

    --//BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")
    --//BU：アキラ（悲しみ・部屋着）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM14.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0318.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I've finished researching the Ryuguuin family... Ahh, I'm so tired." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0488.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Thanks! As expected of Akira!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0489.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "But how did you investigate? When I searched online, I couldn't find any information at all." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0319.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "You know I have a game streaming channel, right?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0490.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Y-Yeah. Sometimes you do live streams too. And you earn your allowance to buy the things you like, right?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0320.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Exactly. I've kept it going for years since I started staying inside, so I've got a decent fan base." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0321.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "And above all, I'm a real JK. Seriously, the fans swarm around. My need for approval gets completely satisfied." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0491.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I-I see." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Sometimes I can't keep up with what Akira says and I get uneasy. ]])

    MSG([[ But she's had a strong sense of online boundaries since before, so surely she's fine. ]])

    MSG([[ There's no one as sensitive to others' malice as Akira. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0322.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Well, setting aside how popular I am online—" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0323.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "There was a fan of my channel. A sheltered young lady who knew about Uran Ryuguuin." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0492.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "T-That's amazing. Then what happened?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0324.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "We became friends through casual chats on streams, played games together over calls, and once I got some info, that was that." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0325.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Hehehe. Even though she liked the streamer, the sheltered young lady who met someone online and talked about private info... she’s so naive it’s hilarious." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0493.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Akira, you’ve got a really bad look on your face... Just don't get into trouble, okay?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0326.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "No worries. My countermeasures against flame wars and doxxing are as solid as the White House." ]])

    MSG([[ Then Akira typed some info into her tablet and showed me the screen. ]])

    MSG([[ The screen displayed a website with the stylish title “Otohime Group,” filled with massive amounts of text that was difficult to read. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0494.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Otohime Group? Is it the official site of some company?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0327.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "It’s one of Japan’s six major corporate groups. You’ve heard of Otohime Pharmaceuticals, Otohime Bank, right?" ]])

    MSG([[ The names are from companies often advertised on TV. I’d grown up hearing those names, so I remembered them well. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0328.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "The Ryuguuin family is the founding clan of Ryugu Holdings, part of that group." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0329.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Tracing their history goes as far back as the Sengoku period. It's a truly prestigious family line." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0330.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "And naturally, they’re one of the richest families in the country. They say they can buy a car as casually as we buy snacks. It’s a completely different world." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0495.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "T-That’s amazing. But if she grew up in such a fine family, you’d think she wouldn’t have any worries." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0496.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I wonder what kind of inner darkness Uran-san is dealing with?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0331.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Well, don’t worry. From here on is the darkness of the Ryuguuin family that I heard about." ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask010",1000,false)

    --//CG：着飾されたウラン
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV016aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask009" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM16.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0332.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "In the Ryuguuin family, there’s a traditional teaching: ‘A woman must dedicate herself fully.’" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0333.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "In other words, ‘Girls should devote their lives to serving others.’ The old-fashioned male chauvinist mindset has been passed down." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0497.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "There are still people who think like that nowadays. I think it’s an outdated way of thinking." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0334.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Yes. That ideology itself isn’t rare even in Japan. But for the Ryuguuin family, it’s on a different level." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0335.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Women are not allowed any path other than becoming a good wife." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0498.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "W-What does that mean...? I don’t get what you’re saying at all." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0336.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "It means exactly that. Getting a job is unthinkable. After finishing school, it’s immediate marriage." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0337.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "From childhood, they learn housework to support their husbands, study etiquette not to shame them, and are married off to heirs from families that benefit the Ryuguuins." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0338.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "...It’s like a training ground for perfect wives." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0339.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "According to my fan’s hearsay, Uran Ryuguuin had a fiancé decided when she was young and was supposed to marry right after graduating from Yuriai Private Academy." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0499.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "T-That’s awful! You’re saying Uran-san’s will doesn’t matter?! What will happen to Uran-san’s life?!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0340.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Because logic doesn’t work with that family, that distorted teaching ‘A woman must dedicate herself fully’ is still alive." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0341.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "If you grow up in an environment where you’re repeatedly told to deny yourself, it’s no surprise you become twisted. It’s not surprising Uran Ryuguuin’s heart is filled with hatred for men." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0500.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "T-That’s... so sad." ]])

    MSG([[ I wonder how I would feel if I grew up in the same environment. ]])

    MSG([[ "You were born to become a wife."_r "You have no future other than becoming a wife."_r "Women must serve men." ]])

    MSG([[ I wonder if Uran’s heart, forced into that kind of education, is filled with dark emotions. ]])
    --//effect：セピア加工（回想）
    --//CG：お茶会
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV011aa")
    FILTER_SCREEN(2)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ The time I spent with Uran until now, she seemed genuinely happy. ]])

    MSG([[ She always cares about others and tries to protect them. She’s such a kind-hearted person. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s hard to believe that smile was a lie. I don’t want to believe Uran’s kindness was a lie. ]])

    MSG([[ I want to know more about her and face Uran’s true feelings. ]])

    MSG([[ Because I believe it’s my mission to do so, after having hurt Uran without knowing anything. ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)
    FILTER_SCREEN(0)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask010",1000,false)

    --//BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")
    --//BU：アキラ（ニヤリ・部屋着）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask009" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM14.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0342.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Welcome back from your inner monologue. You were having a long internal debate again, right?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0501.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "How did you know!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0343.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Minachin’s expression changes all the time when you’re thinking." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03eb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0344.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I love that about you, but be careful outside. You just look like a weird person." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0502.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I-I will. Sorry, thank you." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ While I was feeling down, Akira operated her tablet again and opened Ryugu Holdings’ homepage to show me. ]])

    MSG([[ Then she opened the information page of an affiliated company and pointed at it with her finger. There was a familiar name written there. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0345.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "If you want to know Uran Ryuguuin’s true feelings, you should talk to someone closer to her." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0346.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "The daughter of Ryujouin Seika, a subsidiary of Ryugu Holdings." ]])

    MSG([[ —Ryujouin. The same last name as my knight, Yuri Ryujouin, who’s currently absent from practice for the Hakuyou Festival performance. ]])

    MSG([[ I don't think it's a coincidence. If it's her, I can probably hear something more solid. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0503.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Thank you so much, Akira! Today, I’ll make anything you like!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0347.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Yay! Then please make me Minachin-don. The egg should be soft-boiled." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0504.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Of course, no problem. I’ll go buy shrimp and kaiware radish after this. Let's go shopping together." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0348.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Ehh... I don’t want to go outside. I want to stay home. Home is the best." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0505.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Geez... You haven’t gone outside for three days, right? You need to go out sometimes. Let’s go together?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0349.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "No no no no no!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0506.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "...Okay. I’ll buy you any ice cream you want. So please come with me." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0350.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Deal, then. Let’s go to the ice cream aisle." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0507.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Vegetables first, okay? Don’t put ice cream in first or it’ll melt." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ After we ate together, I messaged Ryujouin on SNS and arranged to meet her outside school. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    --　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP03_16")

end
